artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Murataya Ichigorō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 238, chūban #07.5
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Poem
When the wind comes from ocean to the Tamagawa river in Mutsu province in evening, plovers cry flying over the river. 
Japanese: u_sareba shiokaze ??? michinoku no noda no tamagawa chidori naku nari
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Six Jewel Rivers in Old Poems (Koka Mu Tamagawa 古歌六玉川)
title: Noda [Jewel River] in Mutsu Province
